content: p l y m o u t h y a r n® f999 free pattern with our compliments find inspiration www plymouthyarn com dreambaby dk baby afghan squares finished sizes a doll size 16 x 19 b cradle car seat or stroller size 21 5 x 25 c portable crib size 27 x 31 d crib size 33 x 37 shown materials dreambaby dk 2 4 6 8 50g balls shown in color 158 new mint needles 24 circular needle size 7 or that needed to achieve gauge gauge 20 sts = 4 over pattern stitch seed stitch pattern * p1 k1 repeat from * to last stitch end with p1 with circular needle loosely cast on 83 113 143 173 sts work 8 row in seed stitch before starting square pattern square pattern row 1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 * k13 p2 repeat from * 3 5 7 9 times k13 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 row 2 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 purl to last 5 sts p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 repeat row 1 & 2 6 more times for a total of 14 row notice that first and last 5 sts of each row are worked in seed stitch row 15 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 purl to last 5 sts p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 row 16 repeat row 15 repeat row 1-16 6 9 12 15 more times there will be 7 10 13 16 squares vertically repeat row 1-14 work 8 row of seed stitch bind off loosely in seed stitch weave in all ends block if desired ©2022 plymouth yarn co 050422jbt abbreviations k = knit p = purl st s = stitch es rs = right side ws = wrong side yo = yarn over k2tog = knit 2 sts together psso = pass the slipped st over
